project_parts.notes: Classification derived manually; project-types.csv not present in repository.

findings.project_classification: Monolith backend (Azure Functions) with 1 part covering all functions and shared utilities.
findings.existing_docs_summary: 30 existing documentation assets located across root, config/, docs/api, docs/architecture, docs/guides, and docs/troubleshooting.
findings.technology_summary: Azure Functions backend (Node.js 18) with eight HTTP/timer bindings, extensive SharePoint + UiPath integration, and structured logging plus telemetry collectors.

Single-part project (monolith); integration architecture step not applicable.
